values:
Sitting on my bed
thoughts running through my head
memories of the past
keep coming back
wishing they would fade
wishing i would die
wishing you were here
to sit by my side

Looking out the window
looking at the stars
wishing things werent this hard
my eyes are red and filled with tears
as i hear the echo in my ears
telling me to cut
telling me to die
telling me many many lies

The echo fades as i look down
and see the blood on the ground
blood and tears there are no more
because i am dead on the floor

Not a day goes by that I dont think of you,
It may be sad but its definitely true.
I love you with all my heart,
I will never let us part.
In your arms is where I want to be,
forever and for all eternity.
My love for you will always stay,
and it gets stronger by the day.
You are perfect in my eyes,
our love will never die.
You mean the world to me,
I hope you see because together we will always be.



I Love You Jordon <3

Have you ever felt that no matter what you do or say that your life will never go as you would like and things are just going to keep getting worse until they cant possibly get any worse.Well I'm feeling that way right now.I often find myself sitting here wondering where my life is headed and rather or not i will ever be on the right track.Things are going so wrong right now that I dont see them ever getting any better. I sit here and cry,you may not always be able to see the tears but thats because Im crying on the inside. I just recently moved to georgia to be with my bf.I love him to death but he can be really mean and hurtful alot of the times. We argue almost constantly,but I just cant seem to leave.He was my first love.We dated for a year and then brokeup for 2 and then got back together.
I always find myself sitting here and dwelling on the past.When will the pain subside and when will the memories disappear. Im not sure how much more I can take.I feel so worthless and like I dont belong anywhere and it doesnt help that some of the people that i love have made me feel that way.I find myself getting more and more depressed each day.I thought it was all going away but that was just me dreaming.Sometimes I want to give up on everything and other times i want to work everything out and solve all my problems.I dont know what to do but im tired of feeling sorry for myself so im going to wrap this up.Maybe just maybe everything will get better but im not counting on it.

On Saturday my boyfriend and I went to petsmart to get our dog zoe a new collar and there were these girls outside giving away free boxer terrier mix 7 week old puppies.Well we went to pet them and hold them and then my bf looks at me and asks if i want one and,of course being the dog lover i am, i said yes and so we got a girl puppy and i named her Mia.Shes so cute but she whines too much at night and shes not house trained and it sucks trying to train her lol but oh well.Anyways heres some pics of her and a few pics of her and Zoe.Please comment on them if ya like.It would be greatly appreciated.

On Saturday my boyfriend and I went to petsmart to get our dog zoe a new collar and there were these girls outside giving away free boxer terrier mix 7 week old puppies.Well we went to pet them and hold them and then my bf looks at me and asks if i want one and,of course being the dog lover i am, i said yes and so we got a girl puppy and i named her Mia.Shes so cute but she whines too much at night and shes not house trained and it sucks trying to train her lol but oh well.Anyways heres some pics of her and a few pics of her and Zoe.Please comment on them if ya like.It would be greatly appreciated.
We just got a new puppy and her names Zoe.Heres a few pics:

OMG my bf done the sweetest thing today.I was laying in bed half asleep when i heard a knock on the door.He jumped up to answer it and brought in a long package for me.I sat up in bed and tried opening it.After a few minutes of fighting with it trying to open it.I finally opened it and inside was a dozen red roses.It was sooo sweet I wanted to cry.I love him soooo much.Hes absolutely amazing.Well thats all i had to say :D.

Well I havent updated this in a while and a few things have happened.I came down to georgia in june to stay with my ex so that i could get away from my family and all the stress being caused at home.And we ended up getting back together which i did not expect.He was my first love and i love him more than anything in the world.Originally I was only gonna stay for 2 weeks and then it ended up being like a month.Well i came home for a week in july and then I moved down here to live with him.I am very very happy with him.We do argue quite a bit but we never stay mad long and we always make up afterwards.He makes me happy and hes a wonderful guy despite what he done to me 2 years ago that caused us to break up.I am trying to look past that.We have talked about getting married but im not sure when its gonna happen.

Moving away from home was a very difficult thing to do.I have never been on my own before and dont know the first thing about it.Im a lil scared but hes helping me through it.I miss my mother and my friends.Im living 8 hours away from home.I never thought id move out of my damn house let alone move to another state lol but im sure i can get through this with the help of my loving boyfriend.Hes in the navy and Im home by myself quite a bit but thats alright.Well I guess thats about all I have to say.Ill update more later.

Broken hearts don't seem to fade,
then you walked into my life to stop my pain.
You told me you loved me and I believed it to be true,
I only hope that one day I can actually meet you.
You have the most gorgeous eyes I've ever seen,
so mysterious yet so full of gleam.
You make me smile on a daily basis,
and stop my tears when in a bad situation.
I know we live many miles apart,
but you have already stolen my heart.
I care about you a whole bunch,
I don't think you'll ever realize exactly how much.
Maybe one day our dreams will come true,
and we can meet and be together and live happily ever after.

A sigh of relief fills the room as i raise the razorblade up and slice into my arm.
Im feeling no pain,
only the feeling of blood running down my arm as the memories escape me.
The memories leave me like someones soul leaving their body as they die.
I have no worries and i have no fears as I look down at this huge gash on my arm.
Blood Blood running down my arm and dripping onto the floor.
I notice it but I cant feel it.
My arm goes completely numb but I dont care.
All I care about is getting the painful memories to leave my messed up mind.
All this is, is another Razorblade Romance.

Bloody tears stream down my face
these endless nights with you away.
Bloody tears stream down my face
no one will ever take your place.
Bloody tears stream down my face
I feel alone and empty inside.
Bloody tears stream down my face
you dont notice or think its all fake.
Bloody tears stream down my face
I slit my wrist and hid every trace.
Bloody tears stream down my face
my cutting is getting worse by the day.
Bloody tears stream down my face
the pain is still here and wont go away.
Bloody tears stream down my face
the memories live in my heart everyday.
Bloody tears stream down my face
my life will never be the same.
Bloody tears stream down my face
my mind says to die but my heart says to stay.
Bloody tears stream down my face
please help me soon or i'll vanish without a trace.

Watch me lay here,
drifting off into a deep sleep.
Watch me lay here,
slowly dying.
WATCH ME!,
every breath gettin shorter than the last.

Watch me lay here,
bleeding uncontrollably.
Watch me lay here,
gasping for air.
WATCH ME!
HELP ME!
HOLD ME!

No one can ever make me smile the way you did.
The way you played with my hair.
The way you held me and told me you loved me.
You meant the world to me and I'll always remember you.
The way your gentle lips touched mine ever so lightly,
Oh I can still feel your sweet gentle kiss.
The way your hands roamed over my curvacious body,
Oh the way it felt to have your soft hands caress my sweet cheeks.
The way you ran your tongue across my stomach,
Oh that felt so great.
The way you touched me and kissed me will forever remain with me.

As I walk down that dark lonely road I realize I'm all alone.
No one beside me,to guide me,to show me the way.
No one to help me understand that I'm not as worthless or simple-minded as I seem to believe.
I have no one to hold me,cuddle me, and tell me everything will be alright.
Maybe its my destiny to be all alone and wondering what my life would be like had I dont things differently.
Well I have finally realized that you cant change the past only hope for a better future.

As I sit here on my cold bed I often wonder what it's like to die.Sometimes I catch myself holding my breath just so I can see how long it takes before I almost pass out.crazy huh? Yeah I know,but that's the thing.I can't stop.Sometimes I even cut myself just to watch myself bleed hopeing I'll slip and cut myself bad enough so that I'll bleed to death, but it never happens. I scream for help but it's like no one is listening.I scream louder but it's like being in a closed room with no windows or anything,they can't hear me. The voices in my head won't go away.I tell them to shut up, but they won't listen to me. I keep hopeing that one day this will all go away, but I'm starting to lose hope.Please help me.

I once had a dream to fall in love and be with someone who loved and cared for me and that dream came true when I met you.Then that dream suddenly ended when you lied and deceived me.

Shattered dreams and broken promises seem to be what my life is full of.I thought you were my angel sent to me from the highest heavens to save and protect me from the bad things I was doing, but it's like something evil came and ripped you from my arms and left me with nothing but a painful memory. No matter how much you hurt me and no matter how far apart we are I will always love you.

Love will come and love will go
but my love for you will do nothing but grow.
My life was complete and I was happy inside
now all I want to do is run and hide.

You will forever be in my heart
but I really never wanted us to part.
You will always be the love of my life
and hopefully one day I will be your wife.

I never really got the chance to prove my love to you
and hopefully one day I can do that too.
I know you and I are meant to be
and I'm sure one day you will see.

My love for you burns like fire
you are my one and only desire.
My feelings for you are so deep and true
and I already know that I can't live without you.
